user.title: Set up UniFi Energy Helper
user.description:
This integration will automatically create energy sensors for your UniFi PoE devices.

Click Submit to continue.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
abort.no_unifi_poe_devices: No UniFi PoE devices found. Please ensure the UniFi Network integration is set up and you have PoE-capable switches with power monitoring enabled.
